timeline.bodyText: Just realized the there are a lot of "dots" in the config names. A dot usually means a subdomain. Use "cache.alluxio.config-validation-enabled". Same for other configs.
timeline.author: highker

timeline.bodyText: Can we elaborate a bit more?
timeline.author: highker

timeline.message:
Add alluxio config validation flag

Adding alluxio config validation flag, it can be used to disable the
cache configuration validation. Cache configuration validation is
costly operation.
